ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Lavastorm bug
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail a Lurker!  Hey Rylos!  I have had some zoning issues as well, both in Lavastorm and OOT.  I zoned into OOT from Butcherblock, only to find myself on the
ygData.messageBody:
Hail a Lurker! Hey Rylos! I have had some zoning issues as well, both in
Lavastorm and OOT. I zoned into OOT from Butcherblock, only to find myself
on the sister isle. This has happened a couple of times and is a real pain
as the Freeport bound boat no longer stops there. I have also zoned in and
found myself on the bottom of the world. There was no escape from this
situation, so I had to wait for a guide to show up.

Lavastorm hasn't dropped me in Lava yet, but I have zoned from Najena into
OOT. That was truly bizarre, especially since I was actually headed to
Butcherblock. I've also zoned out of Najena and appeared in Najena near the
Tentacle Terror room. Very odd.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Tieben, David P [mailto:david_tieben@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 13, 2000 1:41 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: [eqbards] RE: Lavastorm bug


I have found Lavastorm to be very buggy when zoning in and out of it. I
have zoned out of Najena into a pool of lava. The guide didn't bat an eye
about rezzing me so I figured it must happen quite often. I also had an odd
occurance happen last night. I was zoning from Nektulos and had a couple
guards on me. and while zoning was disconnected several times. When I
finally got back in I was in the NE corner of the zone rather than by the
zone line. I have only had this happen when zoning from Oasis and dropping
in near the grassy section of N Ro.

Rylos Darmadrigal Bard of the 21st (almost 22nd) chorus on E'ci
